name: Posthog Ingestion Alert Teams Plugin
description: Trigger Teams Webhooks when no events have been ingested to PostHog for a specified time period

config.markdown: Every minute plugin check for new events and alerts when there have been zero within the chosen period

config.hint: This is the number of consecutive minutes with no events before the alert will trigger
config.name: No Ingestion Time Range (minutes)

config.hint: This is the teams webhook url we that will be called when no new events have been detected in the set time range
config.name: Teamms Incoming WebHook URL

config.hint: Your Personal API Key is not the same as the Project API key
config.name: PostHog API Key
